trans-unit.source: Specifies the value to pass to a property to cause the property to get its value from another source.
trans-unit.target: 指定要傳遞給會造成要從其他來源取得其值之屬性的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This is known as *ambience*.
trans-unit.target: 這稱為*氣氛*。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: If a property on a control has ambient behavior, this attribute must be present.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項上的屬性有環境的行為，則必須有這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Ambient properties query their parent for their value, for example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 環境屬性，例如查詢它們的值，其父系、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a visual designer uses the AmbientValueAttribute attribute to decide which value to persist for a property.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，視覺化設計工具會使用 AmbientValueAttribute 屬性決定要保存為屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This is usually a value that causes the property to get its value from another source.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是會導致要從其他來源取得其值之屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: An example of an ambient value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> as the ambient value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，環境的值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>做為環境值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you have a control on a form and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control is set to a different color than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the form, you can reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property of the control to that of the form by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> of the control to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有在表單上的控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>控制項的屬性設定為與不同的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>屬性的表單，您可以重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>要藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>控制項的</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>表單的控制項屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> class, given a Boolean value for its value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>類別，其值指定的布林值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的`value`參數。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"> </xref>要與目前比較<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AmbientValueAttribute"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。
